page.title: 09BIRD SANCTUARY CONTD
page.content: Observation hides have been placed around the site to watch the many birds. To keep the sanctuary open,money is needed.Funds are received from subscriptions from the members of the Naturalists Trust,donations from visitors to the sanctuary and Government grants. There are three trails that visitors can follow:the blue trail covers a distance of 2miles and goes to the Oyster Farm and back.The red trail covers 3miles and goes past the Oyster Farm and Walney Lighthouse.The green trail is just an extension of the red one and leads to an area that is just for nesting birds,usually ducks like Eider,Mallard and Shelduck.
